Objective: Verify navigating to Reward Points page from My Account Reward Points link
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Click My account header and click My Account
2) Click 'View your return requests' link
Expected Result: The User should be taken to Reward Points Page

Objective: Verify navigating to Reward Points page from Reward Points right column options
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Click My account header and click My Account
2) Click Reward Points in right column options
Expected Result: The User should be taken to Reward Points Page

Objective: Verify Reward Points when there are no Reward Points
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Click My account header and click My Account
2) Click Reward Points in right column options
Expected Result: The User should be taken to Reward Points Page and a text "You have not made any previous Reward Points!" should be shown

Objective: Verify Continue button in Reward Points page
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Click My account header and click My Account
2) Click Reward Points in right column options
3) Click Continue button
Expected Result: The User should be taken to My Account Page

Objective: Verify Reward Points Page when there are Reward Points
Precondition:
1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
2) Place a few orders having reward points
Test Steps:
1) Click My account header and click My Account
2) Click Reward Points in right column options
Expected Result: The details of Reward Points should be shown in table format

Objective: Verify the breadcrumb of the Reward Points page
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Click My account header and click My Account
2) Click Reward Points in right column options
Expected Result: The breadcrumb should be displayed and working

Objective: Verify the Reward Points Page functionality in all the supported environments
Precondition:
1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
2) Place a few orders having reward points
Test Steps:
1) Click My account header and click My Account
2) Click Reward Points in right column options
3) Repeat from Step-1 for other environments
Expected Result: The Reward Points Page should work in all supported environments
